text: ass Awakening Occurs. The Halls of Amenti Open and Ascensions Begin. The Three Flame Holders Are Called to Giza to Activate the Hall of Records. The grids of Earth and Tara begin to merge as the morphogentic wave prepares to crest. The Keepers of the Blue Flame complete their D-8 Orion-Earth Core Activation, becoming eighth-level avatars and begin their D-9 Andromeda-Galactic Core Activation. As the ninth DNA strand begins activation and assembly, the third level of the over-soul 218
